experiences.title: Ph.D. in the Faculty of Allied Health and Basic Sciences
experiences.subtitle: Yenepoya University
workDescription: Synthesis and characterization of lysozyme responsive nanocomposites containing dual drugs-latanoprost and timolol, its performance and safety evaluations in vitro, ex vivo, and preclinical models. Fabrication of contact lens containing photoluminescent carbon dots synthesized by reflux method and drug-loaded nanocomposites, polymeric micelles, and evaluation of its theranostic potential during the treatment of glaucoma. Synthesis of Near-Infra Red (NIR) radiation responsive doped carbon dots to treat breast cancer and determination of neurotoxicity of nanoparticles using Drosophila melanogaster model.  Development of chitosan and nano-metal clusters for wound healing application. Fabrication of a paper-based sensing device for the detection of heavy metals in environmental samples. Research output in terms of 2 filed Indian Patents, 4 First author publications from Ph.D.Thesis work.
